options.name: datetimeFormat
options.label: Date time Format
options.help: Sets the date time format to be used in the embed. Please enter a custom format in valid moment.js format http://momentjs.com/docs/#/parsing/string-format

options.name: postsPerPage
options.label: Number of posts per page
options.help: Set the number of posts you initially want to show to your readers

options.name: autoApplyUpdates
options.label: All updates are auto-applied periodically
options.help: Turn off to prompt user to load updates

options.name: autoApplyEdits
options.label: Edits and deletes are applied without prompt
options.help: Turn off to prompt user to load new posts

options.name: canComment
options.label: Users can comment
options.help: Enables a commenting form for users

options.name: showLiveblogLogo
options.label: Show Liveblog logo
options.help: Turn off to hide the “powered by Live Blog” logo

options.name: showAuthor
options.label: Show the author
options.help: Show the author information on posts

options.name: authorNameFormat
options.label: Author name format
options.help: How to show the author info

options.name: showAuthorAvatar
options.label: Show author avatar
options.help: Shows an author image besides the author name

options.name: hasHighlights
options.label: Show highlight button
options.help: Introduces a button for the readers to filter the timeline by highlights

options.name: permalinkDelimiter
options.label: Permalink delimiter
options.help: Sets the delimiter used to send the permalink. ex: permalinkHashMark=?, http://example.com/?...

options.name: blockSearchEngines
options.label: Block search engines
options.help: Will block search engines from indexing the blog content

options.name: showGallery
options.label: Show slideshow gallery
options.help: Multiple image posts will show up as an image gallery

options.name: gaCode
options.label: Google analytics code
options.help: Please paste in your google analytics code

options.name: renderForESI
options.label: Optimise the Live Blog output for ESI
options.help: Strips the head and body tags from the Live Blog output to publish it using Edge Side Includes

options.name: removeStylesESI
options.label: Remove stylesheet from the Live Blog output for ESI
options.help: Removes the link to the stylesheet from the Live Blog output to publish it AMP compatible using Edge Side Includes
